attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrible. It took 7 years of my life just to download, and when I opened the app, Donald (a married man, keep in mind) ASKED FOR MY NUMBER. I’m utterly disgusted by this, especially because I’m a minor.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app took a couple of days after I pressed download to even load properly and access anything. And then I deleted it because Trump 2020 🧚💅💓🥰in jail😍💕😳🧚

attributes.title: EW
attributes.review: I really hoped this app would defend the rights of ALL people but apparently it only does that for white, straight, men 😆😔😥so i guess this app wasn’t made for me, whoops! 🤣also it’s trying to make me go back to school and that is totally not swag 😡🤭🤔

attributes.title: do not download this app!
attributes.review: This app gave me a visual! When it downloaded it opened up a porn website that gave my phone the coronavirus! You’ve been warned listen to the superior white race.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app was forcing me to vote for trump and when I refuse cause I can use more then a brain cell it sed that they will take all my rights away and since I have color on my skin I’ll have fun working for them... now FoCk oof trump 😌

attributes.title: 0/5 stars!!!!
attributes.review: I love mr President trump but I downloaded this app and it told me that my children were sinners because they are mixed race! Then the app called the police on me and the police tased me , a pregnant white woman, 15 times and shot me. I am currently dead. Horrible app!!!!!!

attributes.title: Worst
attributes.review: this app is terrible 🤢 I downloaded it to support our wonderful president and it started glitching like crazy !! Then my phone started talking to me. I would give 0 stars if I could 🤢

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: If I could give this no stats I would. It took 5 days to download and 3 days to delete it. I opened the app and it stole all of my information and leaked it to Facebook!!

attributes.title: Idk
attributes.review: This app is really annoying spams me for some reason....  It also gives me creepy vibes and doesn’t feel like a app more like a you have to type of thing

attributes.title: It is terrible 🤮
attributes.review: I tried signing in and it kicked me out and I tried it over and over again it took me 6 times and please do not download this app
